Header: “SL Democracy locked in a coffin” – Sarath Fonseka
Content: Colombo (News1st): Field Marshal Sarath Fonseka stated that the democracy of Sri Lanka has been locked in a coffin and the last nail has been hammered. Speaking at a media briefing today Sarath Fonseka went onto note that many individuals have realized that the continuation in the UNP, will not lead to a presidential candidate from the party.
